name: event-source-hook
description: Easily intercept, modify, and simulate EventSource server-sent events.

scripts.browser: (npm run build) && (browserify lib/browser.js -o browser/eshook.js -t [ babelify ]) && (uglifyjs browser/eshook.js -o browser/eshook.min.js)
scripts.test:preps: npm list puppeteer || cross-env PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=yes npm install --no-save puppeteer@16
scripts.test:get-chrome: npm run test:preps && cross-env PUPPETEER_PRODUCT=chrome PUPPETEER_DOWNLOAD_PATH=node_modules/puppeteer/.chromium_bin node node_modules/puppeteer/install.js
scripts.test:get-firefox: npm run test:preps && cross-env PUPPETEER_PRODUCT=firefox PUPPETEER_DOWNLOAD_PATH=node_modules/puppeteer/.firefox_bin node node_modules/puppeteer/install.js
scripts.version: (npm run format) && (npm run browser) && (git add -f -A browser)

author: Akwd22 - Eddy D. (https://github.com/Akwd22)
